text: Péter Zachán (born 12 December 1997) is a Hungarian football player who currently plays for Szekszárdi UFC on loan from Paksi FC. ==Career== ===Paks=== On 5 November 2016, Zachán played his first match for Paks in a 2-1 win against Ferencváros in the Hungarian League. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Veszprém |- |2015–16 |32||7||2||0||–||–||34||7 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||32||7||2||0||0||0||34||7 |- |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Paks |- |2016–17 |12||0||1||0||–||–||13||0 |- |2017–18 |9||0||4||1||–||–||13||1 |- |2018–19 |1||0||0||0||–||–||1||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||22||0||5||1||0||0||27||1 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Dorog |- |2018–19 |8||0||1||0||–||–||9||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||8||0||1||0||0||0||9||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Career Total | |62||7||8||1||0||0||70||8 |} ==References== ==External links== *Profile at MLSZ * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kistarcsa Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Veszprém LC footballers Category:Paksi FC players Category:Dorogi FC footballers Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság II players
